item.content:encoded:
01001000 01100101 01101100 01101100 01101111

01010111 01101111 01110010 01101100 01100100 00100001

Wondering what is written in the above encoded codes?

Hmm!! Itâ€™s not that hard. If you havenâ€™t found it yet, will give you a clue. It is a statement used by most of the programming languages to greet the programmer when they meet for the first time.

Yes. You have got it. Itâ€™s Hello World!, whose characters are written in binary.
